title: Ridiculous Flex Queue

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I dont know whether it is just me or not but I'm finding flex queue completely ridiculous!!!! Please explain to me how a team of silvers are matched up against 2 plats and 1 diamond?

Dont get me wrong I dont mind competing against higher elos but receiving enemies who are in a higher elo constantly _IN RANK_ can get quite annoying.

replies.body: Also, close some tabs jesus christ Karin
Alyways in promos youll see this.. once you get placed in your flex rank it shouldnt happen.. it does it to see where your MMR is

Same. Almost every game, and the worst thing is its not even spread across teams. Like one is all high ranks and the other is all low. rito really screwed the pooch again. How are you going to learn if you are a bronze or silver adc paired with a bronze or silver sup and you vs a plat adc and a gold sup. Its not even remotely fair, you get stomped, everyone starts bitching each other out and then someone afks. Pretty consistent experience across the last 20 or so games. Even when you trash your lane opp the mid game difference in golds and plats vs bronze and silver means its just one of the most annoying experiences I have ever had in ranked, and we dont have draft normals, so its aram or ranked coz blind picks sucks donkey balls.
Everyone starts with the same mmr.

It's flex queue and it's purely to test preseason changes and to kinda get a feel for your mmr for next season. I've had Master players in games with Gold/Silvers. I mean it is annoying if you're low elo but all you can really do is improve. These ranked games don't mean much unless your goal is practice.

It's rank, the point is to consistently compete against people who are around your current elo not receive people who are 2-3 tiers higher.  Emphasis the word 'constantly'

Normally it is, but this is the preseason. The short amount of time where you practise the new shit. This the only time in a season where rank doesn't mean anything. I mean it changes your mmr a bit but not too much. I consistently verse people lower than me and I wish it was the other way around for practise sake.  Ranked is purely for people who want to practise stuff and get used to the changes around this time not for super duper climbing™. Thus the people you verse probably won't be around your rank the majority of the time because if you are aiming to climb, this is the wrong time to do it as your rank will be reset in a month anyway.

Yeah, this might be true for you. But it just makes my games not fun when one team is all Gold and above and the other all silver. I can't get better in that game. That game only makes me and my team mates frustrated. I know I'm not that good, last season was the first time I got out of bronze after playing 6 years. However Ranked is still the most enjoyable experience I have in League, I hate normal queue, no one takes the game seriously, and we have no draft normal on OCE, so what am I supposed to do for the next few months? Not play at all??? If flex queue is going to allow this then the new system is worse than last season.

As a side note I've gotten an all gold team + me verse full diamonds I know the pain sometimes. This only lasts until preseason ends which is like a month away so it's not going to be like this for too long

I agree. This was my last game...
